director.name: 丹尼尔·什切胡拉 Daniel Szczechura

introduction: A great addition to the collection Hobby (2001) that is available here at Surreal Moviez. Daniel Szczechura seems to be fairly unknown even amongst animation-fans. His technique, style and personnality, however, are one of their kind, and his work should not be missed. The precision and concision of his shorts just keep your eyes scotched to the screen. This one doesn't miss either. It takes place in the middle of a ski competition, but something rather strange is going to happen. The technique used here is really great, too, and highly unusual.
